title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 1. This Scheme may be cited as the Student Grant (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. This Scheme may be cited as the Student Grant (Amendment) 

Scheme 2020.
text_norm: 1 scheme may cited student grant (amendment) scheme 2020

title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme
text_raw:
2. 

In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme 

2020 (S.I. No.76 – of 2020).
text_norm: 2 scheme principal scheme mean student grant scheme 2020 (s.i no.76 - 2020)

title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 3. This Scheme comes into operation on 30 November 2020.
text_raw: 3. This Scheme comes into operation on 30 November 2020.

title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 4. Article 6 of the Principal Scheme is amended – by the deletion of the
text_raw:
4. Article 6 of the Principal Scheme is amended – by the deletion of the 
word “three” and replaced by the word “four” and by the insertion of the 
following class of grant after “(c) a postgraduate fee contribution:” 

“(d) COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant”
text_norm: 4 article 6 principal scheme amended - deletion word three replaced word four insertion following class grant (c) postgraduate fee contribution (d) covid-19 once-off emergency grant

title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 5. Article 13 of the Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of the
text_raw:
5. Article 13 of the Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of the 

following article after article 12: 

“COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant 

13 – A student or tuition student who has been awarded and is in 
receipt of a maintenance grant, or a fee grant, or a postgraduate fee 
contribution will qualify for the COVID-19 Once-off Emergency 
grant payment. A student, or tuition student, or postgraduate fee 
contribution recipient may not qualify for, or benefit from more than 
one of these payments. ”
text_norm: 5 article 13 principal scheme amended insertion following article article 12 covid-19 once-off emergency grant 13 - student tuition student awarded receipt maintenance grant fee grant postgraduate fee contribution qualify covid-19 once-off emergency grant payment student tuition student postgraduate fee contribution recipient may qualify benefit one payment

title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 6. Article 32 of the Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of the
text_raw:
6. Article 32 of the Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of the 

following article after article 31: 

“Rate and Value – COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [570] 3 

32 - The COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant is payable on a once 
off basis in accordance with Article 13, at the rate specified in 
Schedule 5.”
text_norm: 6 article 32 principal scheme amended insertion following article article 31 rate value - covid-19 once-off emergency grant notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 4th december 2020 570 3 32 - covid-19 once-off emergency grant payable basis accordance article 13 rate specified schedule 5

title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 7. Article 40 of the Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of the
text_raw:
7. Article 40 of the Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of the 

following article after article 39: 

“Payment of COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant 

40 - Payment of the COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant shall be 
made by the awarding authority to all eligible students, tuition 
students or postgraduate fee contribution recipients.”
text_norm: 7 article 40 principal scheme amended insertion following article article 39 payment covid-19 once-off emergency grant 40 - payment covid-19 once-off emergency grant shall made awarding authority eligible student tuition student postgraduate fee contribution recipient

title: Skills (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 8. The Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of Schedule 5:
text_raw:
8. The Principal Scheme is amended by the insertion of Schedule 5: 

“Schedule 5 

Rate of COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant for the Academic Year 

2020/21 

COVID-19 Once-off Emergency Grant 

€250 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the 
making of the foregoing Scheme. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 
30 November, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Further 
and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 

30 November, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [570]
